description: No multiplayer and no sound. Kind of hard to play by yourself - would be better if there was a way to play against bots or other real people.

A nice little basic Yahtzee game to amuse yourself for a few hours. Sound would make this better.
Why not add sound yourself. After all it is 'open'.
You can't remove categories such as three of a kind. No two player local mode. No sound nor dice animation.
